meanings.definition: Incorrectly separated or divided into parts.
meanings.sent1: The misdivided puzzle pieces did not fit together properly.
meanings.sent2: The misdivided cake had uneven layers.
meanings.sent3: The misdivided socks made it look like the person had mismatched feet.
meanings.sent4: Her misdivided attention caused her to miss important details.
meanings.sent5: The misdivided map led them in the wrong direction.

meanings.definition: Divided or separated in a wrong or mistaken way.
meanings.sent1: The misdivided road signs confused the drivers.
meanings.sent2: The misdivided group ended up in different locations.
meanings.sent3: The misdivided ingredients resulted in a strange-tasting dish.
meanings.sent4: Their misdivided opinions caused unnecessary arguments.
meanings.sent5: The misdivided time schedule caused delays in the project.
